objective:
Objective:

Learn how to improve accessibility by providing tooltips for Icon Tabs that lack context.
task:
Task:

You are provided with an IconTabBar that contains several tabs, each represented by an icon.

Set up meaningful tooltips for each icon tab to improve accessibility.

Tooltips will display text descriptions when a user hovers over the tab.
instruction:
Instruction:

In the file /webapp/exercises/Exercise11.fragment.xml add the tooltip property in each IconTabFilter control.
howToTest:
How to test:

  • Use NVDA (Screen Reader) to inspect the Icon Tab Bar . It should vocalize the tooltip defined for each tab.
  • Use the mouse to hover each tab to display the tooltip.
helpCode:
<IconTabFilter
  id="idExercise11InfoIconTabFilter"
  icon="sap-icon://hint"
  key="info"
  //Take a look at tooltip aggregation for sap.m.IconTabFilter control
>
  <Text
    id="idExercise11InfoContentGoesHereText"
    text="{i18n>Exercise11.fragment.iconTabFilter.text.info}"
  />
</IconTabFilter>

<IconTabFilter
  id="idExercise11AttachmentsIconTabFilter"
  icon="sap-icon://attachment"
  key="attachments"
  count="3"
  //Take a look at tooltip aggregation for sap.m.IconTabFilter control
>
  <Text
    id="idExercise11AttachmentsGoesHereText"
    text="{i18n>Exercise11.fragment.iconTabFilter.text.attachments}"
  />
</IconTabFilter>

<IconTabFilter
  id="idExercise11NotesIconTabFilter"
  icon="sap-icon://notes"
  key="notes"
  count="12"
  //Take a look at tooltip aggregation for sap.m.IconTabFilter control>
  <Text
    id="idExercise11NotesGoesHereText"
    text="{i18n>Exercise11.fragment.iconTabFilter.text.notes}"
  />
</IconTabFilter>

<IconTabFilter
  id="idExercise11PeopleIconTabFilter"
  icon="sap-icon://group"
  key="people"
  //Take a look at tooltip aggregation for sap.m.IconTabFilter control
>
  <Text
    id="idExercise11PeopleContentGoesHereText"
    text="{i18n>Exercise11.fragment.iconTabFilter.text.people}"
  />
</IconTabFilter>
